title: SkiaSharp inn Linux Containers
body:
Hello,

I have a project with a dependency on SkiaSharp. It was originally running in Windows, and I'm now trying to get it running on a linux docker container.
My project use SkiarSharp v1.60.0. I have manually added in the same folder the libSkiaSharp.so file found in the release's assets.
But when I try to run the container, I get the "`Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp': The specified module or one of its dependencies could not be found.`" error message.

Does anyone knows how to get it working on Linux / Docker ?

Thanks

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Ah, you may be missing some libraries that are missing. Are you using .NET Core or Mono?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Make sure you have installed fontconfig.

comments.author: ldubrois
comments.body:
It is running on net core with a runtime identifier set to debian-x64.

Is there a way to identify all the dependencies required by SkiaSharp?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: It _should_ just be fontconfig, but you can check the dependencies with ldd/lddtree. But, it should just be fontconfig. If you are using GPU, the you will need to install OpenGL as well.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I created a sample repo with a small container that should just work:
https://github.com/mattleibow/SkiaSharp-Docker

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Closing this as it is working in containers.
Feel free to open another issue if there is a specific problem or question.

comments.author: ldubrois
comments.body: Thanks a lot, I try that in our solution ASAP.

comments.author: ldubrois
comments.body:
Thanks for your sample, it now does load the library correctly but i encountered an another error : 
`Unable to find an entry point named 'sk_bitmap_lock_pixels' in DLL 'libSkiaSharp'`.

I found previous issues indicating you have to explicitly define what is used or not. Is it still correct ?

In our project, SkiaSharp is a dependency of Flexcel. Is there a way to know / list all the method used by Flexcell to get a complete list of the missing methods ?

Thanks.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Ah, you may be using an incorrect version of the native library vs the managed library. The native API is entirely dependent on Google's skia. 

Google removed that particular method in v1.60. The previous version (v1.59.3) still has that method. You can download that native version here: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/releases/tag/v1.59.3

But, just check the version that is currently in use and download that particular one.
